page.title: 16Snowdene Fish Farm
page.content: Snow Dene Fish Farm is in Botcheston. It is open on Saturdays and Sundays from 10.00am to 6.00pm during the summer but in winter it is closed altogether.They sell:-Koi-Carp,Ghost Koi,Goldfish,Golden and Green Tench,Shubunkins and Comet.The cheapest fish which we found was a Goldfish for 50p and the dearest was a Golden Orfe for 15 pounds.Some fish come from other countries-they come by plane.Some countries they come from are:- America,Japan, and Israel.Most of them are bought through a wholesaler.The farm also breeds a lot of its own fish. The fish are fed three times a day.The farm also sells pond plants and pond linings. {Jane
